content:
Stealing 
 Deborah 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 A man caled Kato lived in Bunghumu 
 
 vilage. He used to steal peoples' 
 
 animals . 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 One day he went and stole a goat from 
 
 the neighbouring vilage . He 
 
 slaughtered and kept the meat in his 
 
 house. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The folowing morning the people found 
 
 out that Kato had stolen the goat.They 
 
 started loking for him. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 When they reached Kato's home , they 
 
 found him roasting the meat. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4
